snippet.title: Bubblegum Galaxy - Official Trailer | Ghouls 4 Games
snippet.description: See your colorful building options in this new Bubblegum Galaxy trailer for the upcoming cozy narrative building game about rebuilding the galaxy tile by tile. Discover and design new planets, complete missions, explore your office and befriend your co-workers... all while trying to find out who deleted the galaxy! Bubblegum Galaxy will be available on PC.
